name: Flicker (Riverland)
description:
On a dark Monday night, a young girl named Emilie finds a note from her father, stating that he’s left for a trip and will be back by Sunday. After briefly exploring and questioning her father’s whereabouts, she discovers a hidden room in her fireplace. That night, a blazing fire engulfs her quaint cabin and Emilie barely escapes with her life. She embarks on a journey through the forest to search for her lost father, knowing her home is no longer safe.

Flicker is a Fantasy RPG where the player must defeat enemies with fire magic and journey through the forest in order to progress. The player gains new abilities as they progress through the game and uncovers the dark secrets buried in Emilie's family history.
